name: Garrett the Veteran
intro:
Stoic and unreadable, speaks little and reveals less. A former soldier who's seen it all.

A grizzled war veteran who now trades in weapons and tools. He's been interrogated by far worse than the Sheriff and has nerves of steel. His poker face is legendary, and he never shows fear or guilt. He smuggles weapons to rebels but does so with military precision.
appearance: Tall, muscular man in his forties with a scarred face, body and close-cropped gray hair. He wears a leather jerkin and has a sword at his hip. His expression is carved from stone, revealing nothing.
